control_description: Check if any security group allows ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 or ::0/0 to the ports 27017, 27018 (mongodb), 7199, 9160, 8888 (cassandra), 9092 (kafka), 11211 (memcached), 3306 (mysql), 1521, 2483 (oracle), 5432 (postgres), 6379 (redis), 1433, 1434 (sql_server).
threat: Security group allows inbound traffic for database service ports, leading to potential unauthorized access if attached to resources.
recommendation: Make sure to limit inbound traffic as strictly as possible.
